issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
From comments in PR 2055

-success property should exist in all events for Geolocation events and ideally be set as part of a "buildBaseEvent" or "buildGeolocationEvent" perhaps that is then invoked by the "buildLocationEvent" and "buildErrorEvent" calls
-likewise, provider should always be present
fields.summary: Android: Geolocation module. The location event should always send out provider info when available both when success is true and false

comments.body: Closing ticket due to the time passed and lack of progress since the opening of the ticket. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
